title: Embodied expression through movement and rhythm
author: Migration Script
description: Discover how dance enables authentic self-expression, cultural connection, and joyful communication through the universal language of movement

universal_concept_translations.en: Embodied expression through movement and rhythm
universal_concept_translations.es: Expresión encarnada a través del movimiento y el ritmo
universal_concept_translations.fr: Expression incarnée par le mouvement et le rythme

core_principle_translations.en: Movement and rhythm are universal languages that connect body, mind, emotion, and community
core_principle_translations.es: El movimiento y el ritmo son lenguajes universales que conectan cuerpo, mente, emoción y comunidad
core_principle_translations.fr: Le mouvement et le rythme sont des langages universels qui relient le corps, l'esprit, l'émotion et la communauté

learning_essence: Discover how dance enables authentic self-expression, cultural connection, and joyful communication through the universal language of movement

learning_essence_translations.en: Discover how dance enables authentic self-expression, cultural connection, and joyful communication through the universal language of movement
learning_essence_translations.es: Descubre cómo la danza permite la autoexpresión auténtica, la conexión cultural y la comunicación gozosa mediante el lenguaje universal del movimiento
learning_essence_translations.fr: Découvre comment la danse permet l'expression de soi authentique, la connexion culturelle et une communication joyeuse grâce au langage universel du mouvement

abstract_concepts.rhythm_and_movement: Bouger ton corps avec la musique et le rythme
abstract_concepts.cultural_connection: Danser comme les personnes de ta famille ou de ta communauté

embodied_expression.fr: Utiliser tout ton corps pour montrer tes émotions

teachingMoments.content: Moving and dancing to express how you feel

openings: Ready to unleash your inner dancer?
Time to get your groove on!
Let's turn your body into a celebration!
transitions: But here's where it gets REALLY awesome!
Now for the most epic part!
Get ready for some serious dance magic!
encouragements: You're dancing like a total legend!
closings: Keep being the dancing dynamo you are!
Rock that rhythm everywhere you go!

openings: Feel the joy in your body,
transitions: And now feel this beautiful truth
Let your heart guide your movement

closings: Keep dancing through life, precious one
Let your body sing with joy
Move with love in your heart

relationship_impact.en: Using movement to build connection, celebrate diversity, and share joy

universal_connection.en: The same rhythms that move through dance also flow through nature, relationships, and all of life

universal_connection.fr: Les mêmes rythmes qui traversent la danse circulent aussi dans la nature, les relations et toute la vie
